types:type.name: input_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type input_json = {| id: String, name: String, userName: String, age: String, language: String, genre: String, price: String, groupBooking: String, details: {| noOfSeats: String, category: String |} |} {"example": "{\\\"id\\\":\\\"Asvf1\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"Test\\\",\\\"userName\\\":\\\"asdfa\\\",\\\"age\\\":\\\"1\\\",\\\"language\\\":\\\"Tamil\\\",\\\"genre\\\":\\\"Fiction\\\",\\\"price\\\":\\\"20\\\",\\\"groupBooking\\\":\\\"false\\\",\\\"details\\\":{\\\"noOfSeats\\\":\\\"6\\\",\\\"category\\\":\\\"testk\\\"}}"}
